name: Zenith 460 THOMPSON VertiLift Elevating Hylo Adjusting Table
descr:
460-Zenith THOMPSON VertiLift Elevating Hylo Adjusting Table

The variable height saves wear and tear on you for better results. In addition this table features our Lo-Force drop units, powered by air, for total versatility. Our Lo-Force drops provide consistent, high velocity, low force adjusting. 

Features:

5 Year Limited Parts Warranty 
Forward Motion Headpiece w/ lo-force drop mechanism 
Universal Headraiser raises or tilts 
Face Paper Toweling and Dispenser 
Soft Hinged Dorsal 
Terminal Point Dorsal Drop w/ pneumatic lo-force drop mechanism 
Terminal Point Abdominal Drop w/ pneumatic lo-force drop mechanism 
Slide & Crank Pelvic 
Terminal Point Pelvic Drop w/ 3-way directional pneumatic lo-force mechanism 
Adjustable Front Section 
Adjustable Ankle Rest Cushion 
Dual footswitches for easy access up, down, and stop 
Front mounted up, down, and stop switches 
Tuckaway Foot Board w/ Auto Relaxer 
Heritage Upholstery in a variety of colors 
Base colors available in many coordinating colors 
Table Length 78” 
Table Height varies from 24” - 30” 
Table Width 24” 
Cushion Width 18” 
Table Weight 525 lbs. depending on options
